title: Functional Coverage — Designing Covergroups That Tell You What You Miss
author: Souranil Das
content:
# Functional Coverage — Designing Covergroups That Tell You What You Miss

Functional coverage captures the scenarios your tests exercise. This post shows how to design coverpoints and cross coverage to find holes and plan closure steps.

## Tips
- Sample at stable points using `iff` qualifiers.
- Cross related coverpoints (type × length) to expose missing combinations.
- Weight rare bins to spotlight them in reports.

## Example
```systemverilog
covergroup pkt_cg @(posedge clk);
  type_cp: coverpoint pkt.type { bins r = {0}; bins w = {1}; }
  len_cp: coverpoint pkt.len;
  cross_cp: cross type_cp, len_cp;
endgroup
```
